column1: Local Foods////Parking is an absolute nightmare! The parking lot is small and usually always full. The spaces are narrow
column2: so it's completely necessary to squeeze yourself out the car door rather than swing the door open and get out. Some of these people who try to park are crazy. I know we're competing for spots but don't play chicken with me at 30 mph in a parking lot! To avoid this
column3: come early or park on the street!
